title: WESTWORLD Season 3 Episode 7 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed! Caleb's Past Revealed
author: Think Story
comment: 1 more episode until the finale! Thanks everyone who has watched along the way. Make sure to leave a comment on your thoughts and theories below :)

Pass Pawn is actually an official term in chess. It means something totally different from what you are talking about. A passed Pawn is when your Pawn has no other pieces in its file that might prevent it from advancing all the way  across the board, where it  can be promoted, and turned into whatever piece you want, typically a queen, the most powerful piece on the board. I believe this means that Caleb is turning from just a pawn in the game to a very powerful player. Dolores essentially has taking control of the board and turned Caleb into something that more suitably matches his potential.
I loved it when William said ‘Shut up, can-opener’ when he found out Stubbs was a host. Lol 😂
Caleb is basically the Teddy Delores wanted all along.
At the end right before the EMP goes off, Solomon says "but I must warn you.." then the EMP goes off. I wonder what he was going to warn him about?
description:
In this video we breakdown, explain, review, and recap Season 3 Episode 7 "Passed Pawn" of HBO's Westworld for new theories, easter eggs, and details you missed. Caleb's past is revealed and what might happen in the finale. The new season stars Aaron Paul, Evan Rachel Wood, Ed Harris and Jeffrey Wright.
